sentences.sContent: They put some wet towels on the radiators to humidify the room.
sentences.sContent_eng: They put some wet towels on the radiators to humidify the room.
sentences.sCn: 他们在暖气片上放了些湿毛巾以使房间湿润。

words.tran: 潮湿的；湿润的；多湿气的

trans.tranOther: to add very small drops of water to the air in a room etc because the air is too dry
